Summary: {nd} At least 12 glowing beams/orbs hovering in the sky and did not move.
divs: sighting detailsdriving on interstate 94 just outside of michigan city. at least 12 glowing, hovering orbs\lights were stationary in the sky just above the tree tops and were a yellow\orange color. it was impossible to stop and get a photo as i was on the express way. by the time the lights were in view they were behind me.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Michigan City
There were no other sightings in Michigan City on or around July 28th 2012
